input.html_content: <html><head><title>US10987654B1 - Biodegradable packaging material with enhanced moisture barrier</title></head><body>...</body></html>

api_response.title: Biodegradable packaging material with enhanced moisture barrier
api_response.abstract: A biodegradable packaging material comprising a cellulose-based substrate coated with a bio-derived polymer blend. The material exhibits superior moisture barrier properties compared to conventional biodegradable alternatives while maintaining complete compostability. The coating formulation includes modified chitosan and alginate derivatives in a specific ratio that optimizes both barrier performance and degradation kinetics.

output.title: Biodegradable packaging material with enhanced moisture barrier
output.abstract: A biodegradable packaging material comprising a cellulose-based substrate coated with a bio-derived polymer blend. The coating formulation includes modified chitosan and alginate derivatives in a specific ratio that optimizes both barrier performance and degradation kinetics.

description: Materials science patent with single inventor - demonstrates handling of different claim counts and classification types
